collection_holder_name: Sibley Music Library, Eastman School of Music
pageContext.collection_description: Recording of single 1945 WHAM broadcast of pianist Jose Echaniz + up to 145 broadcasts of local radio host Bill Moyles's Essence of Jazz program
pageContext.collection_notes: Catalog notes Essence of Jazz recordings as ca. 1980s, but staff believe program began in 60s or 70s and that discs could include content from these decades. Coppen will report on any additional items of interest later in November.
